attributes.action: Cut salary of every MP, MEP and Government/Council Official by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The budget deficit is getting out of hand, and we need to save it. Greed is overpowering everywhere. To get the deficit back up, I petition everyone who works in a government office to take a minimum of 50% salary cut. Includes MP's, MEPs, Councilers, Public Officials etc. Increase taxes by 2%.

rejection.details: MP's salaries are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
